UpdateSourceArgs: -c "cd java-app-runner && rm -rf srv >/dev/null 2>&1; DownloadSource=\"{{DownloadSource}}\"; DownloadBranch=\"{{DownloadBranch}}\"; [[ -n \"{{DownloadUsername}}\" ]] && DownloadUrl=\"${DownloadSource/https:\/\//https:\/\/{{DownloadUsername}}:{{DownloadPassword}}@}\" || DownloadUrl=\"$DownloadSource\"; [ ! -d .git ] && { echo \"Installing the app\" && git clone \"$DownloadUrl\" srv >/dev/null && \cp -r srv/. ./ >/dev/null 2>&1 && rm -rf srv >/dev/null 2>&1 && [ -z \"$DownloadBranch\" ] && DownloadBranch=$(git symbolic-ref refs/remotes/origin/HEAD | sed \"s|.*/||\"); git checkout $DownloadBranch --force >/dev/null && git pull >/dev/null && echo \"App installed\"; } || { echo \"Updating the app\" && git remote set-url origin \"$DownloadUrl\" >/dev/null && [ -z \"$DownloadBranch\" ] && DownloadBranch=$(git symbolic-ref refs/remotes/origin/HEAD | sed \"s|.*/||\"); git checkout $DownloadBranch --force >/dev/null && git pull >/dev/null && echo \"App updated\"; }"

-NoProfile -Command "$ProgressPreference='SilentlyContinue'; cd java-app-runner; Remove-Item srv -Recurse -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Out-Null; $DownloadSource = \"{{DownloadSource}}\"; $DownloadBranch = \"{{DownloadBranch}}\"; if (![string]::IsNullOrEmpty(\"{{DownloadUsername}}\")) { $DownloadUrl = $DownloadSource -replace \"https://\", \"https://{{DownloadUsername}}:{{DownloadPassword}}@\" } else { $DownloadUrl = \"$DownloadSource\" }; if (-Not (Test-Path .git)) { Write-Output \"Installing the app\"; git clone \"$DownloadUrl\" srv 1> $null; Copy-Item srv/* ./ -Recurse -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Out-Null; Remove-Item srv -Recurse -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Out-Null; if ([string]::IsNullOrEmpty($DownloadBranch)) { $DownloadBranch = (git symbolic-ref refs/remotes/origin/HEAD) -replace '.*/' }; git checkout --force $DownloadBranch 1> $null; if ($LASTEXITCODE -eq 0) { git pull 1> $null }; if ($LASTEXITCODE -eq 0) { Write-Output \"App installed\" } } else { Write-Output \"Updating the app\"; git remote set-url origin \"$DownloadUrl\" 1> $null; if ([string]::IsNullOrEmpty($DownloadBranch)) { $DownloadBranch = (git symbolic-ref refs/remotes/origin/HEAD) -replace '.*/' }; git checkout --force $DownloadBranch 1> $null; if ($LASTEXITCODE -eq 0) { git pull 1> $null }; if ($LASTEXITCODE -eq 0) { Write-Output \"App updated\" } }"

-c "cd java-app-runner && JarName=\"{{JarName}}\"; DownloadFilename=\"{{DownloadFilename}}\"; if [[ -z \"$JarName\" ]]; then echo \"Jar Name not configured. Skipping rename\"; exit 0; fi; if [[ -z \"$DownloadFilename\" ]]; then echo \"Download filename not configured. Skipping rename\"; exit 0; fi; if [[ \"$DownloadFilename\" == \"$JarName\" ]]; then echo \"Filenames match. No rename needed\"; exit 0; fi; if [[ -f \"$DownloadFilename\" ]]; then mv \"$DownloadFilename\" \"$JarName\" && echo \"Renamed $DownloadFilename to $JarName\"; else echo \"File $DownloadFilename not found. Skipping rename\"; fi"

-NoProfile -Command "Set-Location -Path 'java-app-runner'; $JarName = '{{JarName}}'; $DownloadFilename = '{{DownloadFilename}}'; if ([string]::IsNullOrEmpty($JarName)) { Write-Output 'Jar Name not configured. Skipping rename'; exit 0 }; if ([string]::IsNullOrEmpty($DownloadFilename)) { Write-Output 'Download filename not configured. Skipping rename'; exit 0 }; if ($DownloadFilename -eq $JarName) { Write-Output 'Filenames match. No rename needed'; exit 0 }; if (Test-Path $DownloadFilename) { Rename-Item -Path $DownloadFilename -NewName $JarName -Force; Write-Output \"Renamed $DownloadFilename to $JarName\" } else { Write-Output \"File $DownloadFilename not found. Skipping rename\" }"

-c "cd java-app-runner && if [[ -x java/bin/java ]]; then InstalledVersion=$(java/bin/java --version | grep \"Temurin-\" | head -n1 | sed -n \"s/.*Temurin-\([0-9][0-9]*\(\.[0-9][0-9]*\.[0-9][0-9]*\(\.[0-9][0-9]*\)?\)?+[0-9][0-9]*\).*/\1/p\"); else InstalledVersion=\"\"; fi; LatestVersionBuild=$(wget -qO- \"https://api.adoptium.net/v3/assets/latest/{{SpecificInstanceJavaVersion}}/hotspot?architecture=x64&image_type=jdk&os=linux&vendor=eclipse\" | jq -r \".[0].version.openjdk_version\" | sed \"s/-LTS$//\"); if [[ \"$InstalledVersion\" == \"$LatestVersionBuild\" ]]; then echo \"Eclipse Temurin Java $LatestVersionBuild already installed. Skipping\" && exit 0; else [[ -f java.tar.gz ]] && rm -f java.tar.gz >/dev/null 2>&1; wget -qO java.tar.gz https://api.adoptium.net/v3/binary/latest/{{SpecificInstanceJavaVersion}}/ga/linux/x64/jdk/hotspot/normal/eclipse || { echo \"Download failed from the Eclipse Temurin CDN. This is a fault with the CDN, not AMP. Aborting\"; exit 1; }; mkdir -p java && rm -rf java/* >/dev/null 2>&1 && tar -xzf java.tar.gz -C java --strip-components=1 >/dev/null 2>&1 && rm -f java.tar.gz >/dev/null 2>&1 && chmod +x java/bin/java && echo \"Eclipse Temurin Java $LatestVersionBuild downloaded\"; fi"

-c "cd java-app-runner && if [[ -x java/bin/java ]]; then InstalledVersion=$(java/bin/java --version | grep \"Temurin-\" | head -n1 | sed -n \"s/.*Temurin-\([0-9][0-9]*\(\.[0-9][0-9]*\.[0-9][0-9]*\(\.[0-9][0-9]*\)?\)?+[0-9][0-9]*\).*/\1/p\"); else InstalledVersion=\"\"; fi; LatestVersionBuild=$(wget -qO- \"https://api.adoptium.net/v3/assets/latest/{{SpecificInstanceJavaVersion}}/hotspot?architecture=aarch64&image_type=jdk&os=linux&vendor=eclipse\" | jq -r \".[0].version.openjdk_version\" | sed \"s/-LTS$//\"); if [[ \"$InstalledVersion\" == \"$LatestVersionBuild\" ]]; then echo \"Eclipse Temurin Java $LatestVersionBuild already installed. Skipping\" && exit 0; else [[ -f java.tar.gz ]] && rm -f java.tar.gz >/dev/null 2>&1; wget -qO java.tar.gz https://api.adoptium.net/v3/binary/latest/{{SpecificInstanceJavaVersion}}/ga/linux/aarch64/jdk/hotspot/normal/eclipse || { echo \"Download failed from the Eclipse Temurin CDN. This is a fault with the CDN, not AMP. Aborting\"; exit 1; }; mkdir -p java && rm -rf java/* >/dev/null 2>&1 && tar -xzf java.tar.gz -C java --strip-components=1 >/dev/null 2>&1 && rm -f java.tar.gz >/dev/null 2>&1 && chmod +x java/bin/java && echo \"Eclipse Temurin Java $LatestVersionBuild downloaded\"; fi"

-NoProfile -Command "$ProgressPreference='SilentlyContinue'; [Net.ServicePointManager]::SecurityProtocol = [Net.SecurityProtocolType]::Tls12; Set-Location -Path 'java-app-runner'; if (Test-Path 'java/bin/java.exe') { $InstalledVersion = (& java/bin/java.exe --version | Select-String -Pattern 'Temurin-(\d+(?:\.\d+\.\d+(?:\.\d+)?)?\+\d+)' | Select-Object -First 1 | ForEach-Object { $_.Matches[0].Groups[1].Value }) } else { $InstalledVersion = '' }; $LatestVersionBuild = (Invoke-RestMethod -UseBasicParsing -Uri \"https://api.adoptium.net/v3/assets/latest/{{SpecificInstanceJavaVersion}}/hotspot?architecture=x64&image_type=jdk&os=windows&vendor=eclipse\")[0].version.openjdk_version -replace '-LTS$', ''; if ( $InstalledVersion -eq $LatestVersionBuild ) { Write-Output \"Eclipse Temurin Java $LatestVersionBuild already installed. Skipping\"; exit 0 } else { if ( Test-Path java.zip ) { Remove-Item java.zip -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue *> $null }; try { Invoke-WebRequest -UseBasicParsing -Uri https://api.adoptium.net/v3/binary/latest/{{SpecificInstanceJavaVersion}}/ga/windows/x64/jdk/hotspot/normal/eclipse -OutFile java.zip -ErrorAction Stop } catch { Write-Output \"Download failed from the Eclipse Temurin CDN. This is a fault with the CDN, not AMP. Aborting\"; exit 1; }; Expand-Archive -Path \"java.zip\" -DestinationPath \".\" -Force *> $null; if ( Test-Path java.zip ) { Remove-Item java.zip -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue *> $null }; if (Test-Path \"jdk-*\") { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force java -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue *> $null; Start-Sleep -Seconds 2; Get-ChildItem -Directory | Where-Object { $_.Name -like \"jdk-*\" } | Rename-Item -NewName \"java\" *> $null; Write-Output \"Eclipse Temurin Java $LatestVersionBuild downloaded\" } }"

-c "cd java-app-runner && mkdir -p plugins && PluginSource=\"{{PluginSource}}\"; PluginVersion=\"{{PluginVersion}}\"; PluginToken=\"{{PluginGitHubToken}}\"; if [[ -z \"$PluginSource\" ]]; then echo \"Plugin source not configured. Skipping\"; exit 0; fi; if [[ -z \"$PluginVersion\" ]]; then ReleaseUrl=\"https://api.github.com/repos/$PluginSource/releases/latest\"; else ReleaseUrl=\"https://api.github.com/repos/$PluginSource/releases/tags/$PluginVersion\"; fi; echo \"Fetching plugin release info from $ReleaseUrl\"; if [[ -n \"$PluginToken\" ]]; then AuthHeader=\"Authorization: token $PluginToken\"; ReleaseData=$(wget -qO- --header=\"$AuthHeader\" \"$ReleaseUrl\"); else ReleaseData=$(wget -qO- \"$ReleaseUrl\"); fi; if [[ -z \"$ReleaseData\" ]]; then echo \"Failed to fetch release info. Check the Plugin GitHub Source and Version settings\"; exit 1; fi; AssetIds=$(echo \"$ReleaseData\" | jq -r '.assets[] | select(.name | endswith(\".jar\")) | "\(.id) \(.name)"'); if [[ -z \"$AssetIds\" ]]; then echo \"No .jar files found in the release\"; exit 1; fi; echo \"Downloading plugin JARs to plugins/ folder...\"; while IFS=' ' read -r assetId assetName; do echo \"Downloading $assetName\"; AssetUrl=\"https://api.github.com/repos/$PluginSource/releases/assets/$assetId\"; if [[ -n \"$PluginToken\" ]]; then wget -qO \"plugins/$assetName\" --header=\"Authorization: token $PluginToken\" --header=\"Accept: application/octet-stream\" \"$AssetUrl\" || echo \"Failed to download $assetName\"; else wget -qO \"plugins/$assetName\" --header=\"Accept: application/octet-stream\" \"$AssetUrl\" || echo \"Failed to download $assetName\"; fi; done <<< \"$AssetIds\"; echo \"Plugin download complete\""

-NoProfile -Command "$ProgressPreference='SilentlyContinue'; [Net.ServicePointManager]::SecurityProtocol = [Net.SecurityProtocolType]::Tls12; Set-Location -Path 'java-app-runner'; if (-Not (Test-Path 'plugins')) { New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path 'plugins' | Out-Null }; $PluginSource = '{{PluginSource}}'; $PluginVersion = '{{PluginVersion}}'; $PluginToken = '{{PluginGitHubToken}}'; if ([string]::IsNullOrEmpty($PluginSource)) { Write-Output 'Plugin source not configured. Skipping'; exit 0 }; if ([string]::IsNullOrEmpty($PluginVersion)) { $ReleaseUrl = \"https://api.github.com/repos/$PluginSource/releases/latest\" } else { $ReleaseUrl = \"https://api.github.com/repos/$PluginSource/releases/tags/$PluginVersion\" }; $Headers = @{}; if (-Not [string]::IsNullOrEmpty($PluginToken)) { $Headers['Authorization'] = \"token $PluginToken\" }; Write-Output \"Fetching plugin release info from $ReleaseUrl\"; try { $ReleaseData = Invoke-RestMethod -UseBasicParsing -Uri $ReleaseUrl -Headers $Headers } catch { Write-Output 'Failed to fetch release info. Check the Plugin GitHub Source and Version settings'; exit 1 }; $JarAssets = $ReleaseData.assets | Where-Object { $_.name -like '*.jar' }; if ($JarAssets.Count -eq 0) { Write-Output 'No .jar files found in the release'; exit 1 }; Write-Output 'Downloading plugin JARs to plugins/ folder...'; foreach ($asset in $JarAssets) { Write-Output \"Downloading $($asset.name)\"; $AssetUrl = \"https://api.github.com/repos/$PluginSource/releases/assets/$($asset.id)\"; $DownloadHeaders = @{ 'Accept' = 'application/octet-stream' }; if (-Not [string]::IsNullOrEmpty($PluginToken)) { $DownloadHeaders['Authorization'] = \"token $PluginToken\" }; try { Invoke-WebRequest -UseBasicParsing -Uri $AssetUrl -Headers $DownloadHeaders -OutFile \"plugins/$($asset.name)\" } catch { Write-Output \"Failed to download $($asset.name)\" } }; Write-Output 'Plugin download complete'"

-c "cd java-app-runner && mkdir -p plugins && PluginSource=\"{{PluginSource}}\"; PluginVersion=\"{{PluginVersion}}\"; PluginZipFilename=\"{{PluginZipFilename}}\"; PluginToken=\"{{PluginGitHubToken}}\"; if [[ -z \"$PluginSource\" ]]; then echo \"Plugin source not configured. Skipping\"; exit 0; fi; if [[ -z \"$PluginZipFilename\" ]]; then echo \"Plugin zip filename not configured. Skipping\"; exit 0; fi; if [[ -z \"$PluginVersion\" ]]; then ReleaseUrl=\"https://api.github.com/repos/$PluginSource/releases/latest\"; else ReleaseUrl=\"https://api.github.com/repos/$PluginSource/releases/tags/$PluginVersion\"; fi; echo \"Fetching plugin release info from $ReleaseUrl\"; if [[ -n \"$PluginToken\" ]]; then AuthHeader=\"Authorization: token $PluginToken\"; ReleaseData=$(wget -qO- --header=\"$AuthHeader\" \"$ReleaseUrl\"); else ReleaseData=$(wget -qO- \"$ReleaseUrl\"); fi; if [[ -z \"$ReleaseData\" ]]; then echo \"Failed to fetch release info. Check the Plugin GitHub Source and Version settings\"; exit 1; fi; AssetId=$(echo \"$ReleaseData\" | jq -r --arg filename \"$PluginZipFilename\" '.assets[] | select(.name == $filename) | .id'); if [[ -z \"$AssetId\" || \"$AssetId\" == \"null\" ]]; then echo \"Zip file '$PluginZipFilename' not found in the release\"; exit 1; fi; AssetUrl=\"https://api.github.com/repos/$PluginSource/releases/assets/$AssetId\"; echo \"Downloading $PluginZipFilename...\"; if [[ -n \"$PluginToken\" ]]; then wget -qO \"plugins.zip\" --header=\"Authorization: token $PluginToken\" --header=\"Accept: application/octet-stream\" \"$AssetUrl\" || { echo \"Failed to download $PluginZipFilename\"; exit 1; }; else wget -qO \"plugins.zip\" --header=\"Accept: application/octet-stream\" \"$AssetUrl\" || { echo \"Failed to download $PluginZipFilename\"; exit 1; }; fi; echo \"Extracting to plugins/ folder...\"; unzip -o \"plugins.zip\" -d \"plugins/\" >/dev/null 2>&1 && rm -f \"plugins.zip\"; echo \"Plugin download complete\""

-NoProfile -Command "$ProgressPreference='SilentlyContinue'; [Net.ServicePointManager]::SecurityProtocol = [Net.SecurityProtocolType]::Tls12; Set-Location -Path 'java-app-runner'; if (-Not (Test-Path 'plugins')) { New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path 'plugins' | Out-Null }; $PluginSource = '{{PluginSource}}'; $PluginVersion = '{{PluginVersion}}'; $PluginZipFilename = '{{PluginZipFilename}}'; $PluginToken = '{{PluginGitHubToken}}'; if ([string]::IsNullOrEmpty($PluginSource)) { Write-Output 'Plugin source not configured. Skipping'; exit 0 }; if ([string]::IsNullOrEmpty($PluginZipFilename)) { Write-Output 'Plugin zip filename not configured. Skipping'; exit 0 }; if ([string]::IsNullOrEmpty($PluginVersion)) { $ReleaseUrl = \"https://api.github.com/repos/$PluginSource/releases/latest\" } else { $ReleaseUrl = \"https://api.github.com/repos/$PluginSource/releases/tags/$PluginVersion\" }; $Headers = @{}; if (-Not [string]::IsNullOrEmpty($PluginToken)) { $Headers['Authorization'] = \"token $PluginToken\" }; Write-Output \"Fetching plugin release info from $ReleaseUrl\"; try { $ReleaseData = Invoke-RestMethod -UseBasicParsing -Uri $ReleaseUrl -Headers $Headers } catch { Write-Output 'Failed to fetch release info. Check the Plugin GitHub Source and Version settings'; exit 1 }; $ZipAsset = $ReleaseData.assets | Where-Object { $_.name -eq $PluginZipFilename }; if ($null -eq $ZipAsset) { Write-Output \"Zip file '$PluginZipFilename' not found in the release\"; exit 1 }; $AssetUrl = \"https://api.github.com/repos/$PluginSource/releases/assets/$($ZipAsset.id)\"; $DownloadHeaders = @{ 'Accept' = 'application/octet-stream' }; if (-Not [string]::IsNullOrEmpty($PluginToken)) { $DownloadHeaders['Authorization'] = \"token $PluginToken\" }; Write-Output \"Downloading $PluginZipFilename...\"; try { Invoke-WebRequest -UseBasicParsing -Uri $AssetUrl -Headers $DownloadHeaders -OutFile 'plugins.zip' } catch { Write-Output \"Failed to download $PluginZipFilename\"; exit 1 }; Write-Output 'Extracting to plugins/ folder...'; Expand-Archive -Path 'plugins.zip' -DestinationPath 'plugins' -Force; Remove-Item 'plugins.zip' -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Write-Output 'Plugin download complete'"
